Dual Enrollment (2 courses only) Per credit (limited to high school students only) $180

Elder Scholars per credit $315

For a limited number of students 65 years of age and older; one day course per semester/term may be taken on a space-available basis. For more information, call 509.777.3205. The Elders Scholars program will be discontinued starting Fall 2024.

Special Courses/Workshops See individual flyer/bulletin. (Tuition varies per course and IS NOT INCLUDED with either regular day or evening class tuition. Special "S" course/workshop tuition is charged separately.)
